resources.string: Use only test data while running ARO Data Collector.
ARO Data Collector STARTED! \n\nPlease navigate to the application you would like to test. After testing of your application is complete, please return to ARO to stop the ARO Data Collector.

Built from Public code supplied by 
 AT&T Developer Program 
 
 http://developer.att.com/aro
SD card is either not available or it is mounted. Please check the SD card before running ARO-Data Collector.
SD Card mounted, ARO Data Collector trace session terminated.
ARO Data Collector failed to start!
ARO Data Collector trace collection stopped.
ARO Data Collector trace session can\'t be started with flight mode ON and while there was no active WIFI connection.
ARO Data Collector trace session stopped due to flight mode being turned ON while there was no active WIFI connection.
ARO Data Collector trace session can\'t be started with no active network connection.
SD Card memory full, stopping ARO Data Collector.
Trace folder name can not have special characters or spaces.
Trace folder already exists! Do you want to overwrite existing trace?

You do not have administrator-level permission (i.e., root level access) on this device. It is recommended that you use a device that is dedicated to experimentation and testing since rooting may have an adverse impact on device performance and/or manufacturer warranty.
ARO Data Collector instance is already running on the device!
ARO Data Collector launch from the Analyzer is already in progress
